schools.name: Bridgeport Grade School
schools.school-summary: Bridgeport Grade School, a public school located in Bridgeport, IL, serves grades PK-3 in the Red Hill Community Unit School District 10.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 6 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
schools.district-name: Red Hill Community Unit School District 10
schools.rating-description: The GreatSchools Rating helps parents compare schools within a state based on a variety of school quality indicators and provides a helpful picture of how effectively each school serves all of its students. Ratings are on a scale of 1 (below average) to 10 (above average) and can include test scores, college readiness, academic progress, advanced courses, equity, discipline and attendance data. We also advise parents to visit schools, consider other information on school performance and programs, and consider family needs as part of the school selection process.

schools.name: Red Hill Jr/Sr High School
schools.school-summary: Red Hill Jr/Sr High School, a public school located in Bridgeport, IL, serves grades 7-12 in the Red Hill Community Unit School District 10.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 5 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
